alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 4:57PM CDT until May 09 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR EASTERN PAWNEE AND NORTHWESTERN STAFFORD COUNTIES... At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Larned, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Larned, Garfield, Radium, Zook and Frizell. Two inch diameter hail was reported in Larned at 455 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
